name: Sentient Billiards
description: Sentient Billiards lets you play as either the Cue Ball or the 8-Ball on a Billiards table. Your goal as the Cue Ball is to hit the 8-Ball within 30 seconds. Your goal as the 8-Ball is to avoid getting hit by the Cue Ball for 30 seconds. Your enemy in each case is an Artificial Intelligence trained by a Neural Network
